column1: 0245|Quarter to three|He glanced down at his watch. He had been smiling as he stroked her awake
column2: and was smiling now. “Quarter to three. I sat in my stupid old motel room for almost two hours after we talked
column3: trying to convince myself that what I was thinking couldn’t be true. Only I didn’t get where I am by dodging the truth.”
the hours that are truly wee.
